welcome.paracik: 1 Paracık = 1₺, can be used as currency.

auth.title: Hopi knows you from your e-mail!
auth.subtitle: You should write the name, email address, and password you want to use for Hopi membership

login.alert1: Please enter your email and password information.

signup.alert1: Please enter your email and password information.
signup.alert3: Verification e-mail has been sent. Please check your email and verify your account.
signup.alert5: Password must be at least 6 characters
signup.metin1: I have read and accept the Consent Text.

cards.metin2: Save your cards to Masterpass and shop easily with Hopi mobile payment.
cards.metin5: You can add your Istanbulkart and load money to it with Paracık.

balance.metin4: You can spend at least 1.50 TL in all brands that have an agreement with Hopi.

tlBalance.metin1: Hopipay is a free virtual card that you can easily load and spend anywhere. With this card, you can;
tlBalance.metin2: spend your money multiple times at Hopi affiliated brands.
tlBalance.metin3: send money instantly to your friends
tlBalance.metin4: shop easily on all e-commerce sites.

qr.metin1: Your QR code will be refreshed
qr.metin3: Scan the QR code at checkout

welcomeScreen.metin2: What would you like to do with Hopi?
